title: reckle
message:
-use reckle.com to code

-forward slash and asterisk to close a multi-line comment

in var, capitalize every first letter of the following words:. declare the variable::::
ex: var name = 'Alisha'

the next line is to actually assign the variable name = 'AlishaCodes'

true=1
false=0

console.log(number)
